formalpara.title: Interner Hilfetext zu dieser Applikation in Asterisk 1.4:

para.screen:
-= Info about application 'SLATrunk' =-
[Synopsis] Shared Line Appearance Trunk
[Description] SLATrunk(trunk): This application should be executed by an SLA trunk on an inbound call. The channel calling this application should correspond to the SLA trunk with the name "trunk" that is being passed as an argument. On exit, this application will set the variable SLATRUNK_STATUS to one of the following values: FAILURE | SUCCESS | UNANSWERED | RINGTIMEOUT

formalpara.title: Differenz des internen Hilfetexts von Asterisk 1.2 zu 1.4:
Differenz des internen Hilfetexts von Asterisk 1.4 zu 1.6:

para.screen:
--- in Asterisk 1.4 +++ in Asterisk 1.6 @@ -4,10 +4,12 @@ Shared Line Appearance Trunk
[Description] - SLATrunk(trunk): + SLATrunk(<trunk name>[,options]): This application should be executed by an SLA trunk on an inbound call. The channel calling this application should correspond to the SLA trunk with the name "trunk" that is being passed as an argument. On exit, this application will set the variable SLATRUNK_STATUS to one of the following values: FAILURE | SUCCESS | UNANSWERED | RINGTIMEOUT + The available options are: + M[(<class>)] - Play back the specified MOH class instead of ringing
